item.title: NewATTRACTsnip
item.itunes:author: Chris Emerson & Renita
item.description: http://www.planetemerson.com/renitapodcast.html Renita explores a very accesible and practical application of the law of attraction as it pertains to the industry. She also touches on how it can often be more dangerous to be unaware of its' effects.

item.title: NewEYES1snip
item.itunes:author: Chris Emerson & Renita
item.description: http://www.planetemerson.com/renitapodcast.html Renita discusses what your audition really means to a casting director. The things a casting director remembers when deciding whether or not you are the actor for the job are not always what you think.
